original_text: He chose to make us his children. He used his true message to do that. Because of that, we are like the first special gift that belongs to him from among everything that he has made.
korean_text: 그가 그 피조물 중에 우리로 한 첫 열매가 되게 하시려고 자기의 뜻을 따라 진리의 말씀으로 우리를 낳으셨느니라

sentences.original_text: He chose to make us his children
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리를 자기 자녀로 삼기로 선택하셨다

sentences.original_text: He used his true message to do that
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그렇게 하기 위해 진실된 말씀을 사용하셨다

sentences.original_text: we are like the first special gift
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 첫 번째 특별한 선물과 같다

sentences.original_text: from among everything that he has made
